intro: WOOF ~ In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange lovely doggos in a way that fits the grid.
description:
“A true friend leaves paw prints on your heart.”
And we have 30 friends just waiting for you to pet them! Our good boys and girls come in all shapes and sizes.

However, they are way too energetic for us to handle alone so we need YOUR help to organize all these doggos!
Just pick them up and place them on the grid over there.
And don’t worry if you rotate them a bit, they may bark, but they never bite.

KEY FEATURES

• Dogs
30 brand-new & unique hand-drawn dogs for you to befriend, collect, and organize (neatly).

• Handcrafted Levels
80 brand-new handcrafted levels, which will tickle your brain.

• Relaxing Music
Dogs Organized Neatly has relaxing background music! Pretend you're dog-sitting your favourite puppers or spending a relaxed afternoon with your best furry friend.
